message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product for a great price. I think you'll really appreciate its value.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $10000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $10000. I'm willing to compromise, though. How about we meet in the middle at $12500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could we possibly agree on a price closer to $9000?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $11000?
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still aiming to keep my spending within my budget. Would it be possible to reach an agreement at $10500?
I'm getting a bit frustrated that we're not meeting in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $13000?
